sentences.en: After exiting the installer, we have just a few settings to tweak.
sentences.cn: 推出安装程序后, 还有几个设置要“搞”一下.

sentences.en: Does sword arm humerus interrupt bone what to tweak to have repeatedly?
sentences.cn: 右臂肱骨中断骨不连有什么好办法?

sentences.en: Genetic tweak makes virus favour human nose and throat.
sentences.cn: 基因变异使病毒更适应人类的鼻和喉.

sentences.en: He expects the system to get even better as the engineers tweak its performance.
sentences.cn: 他预计在工程师对其性能稍加改进后，该系统会运行得更加良好。

sentences.en: He gave the boy's ear a painful tweak.
sentences.cn: 他用力拧了一下那男孩的耳朵.

sentences.en: Integrated comprehensive theme settings page to tweak layout through admin dashboard.
sentences.cn: 综合全面的主题设置网页,通过调整管理仪表板的布局.

sentences.en: Is there the tweak that treats enteritis?
sentences.cn: 有治疗肠炎的好办法 么 ?

sentences.en: She leant forward and tweaked both ends of his moustache.
sentences.cn: 她俯身向前，扯住他的两撇胡子。

sentences.en: The rest could be made up with a tweak to compensation ratios.
sentences.cn: 其余部分可以通过调整薪酬支出来弥补.

sentences.en: Tweak the options slightly depending on opposition and quality of your team.
sentences.cn: 而如果对阵垫底三队也客场打平就要失望了.

sentences.en: Users could tweak their PCs in various ways to personalize them.
sentences.cn: 用户可以用各种方式来调整自己的PC,实现个性化.

sentences.en: What tweak does child night sweat have to you can be solved?
sentences.cn: 孩子盗汗有什么好办法可解决?

sentences.cn: 老年人骨折有什么好办法?

sentences.cn: 有什么好办法治疗灰指甲?

sentences.cn: 谁有治疗灰指甲的好办法?

trans.tran_cn: 扭， 拧， 揪； 调节， 微调
trans.tran_en: to suddenly pull or twist something
